name: Ant Hill Massacre
description:
This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021. It follows the theme stronger together and it is my first game so there are a few kinks. 

The music, art, and code are all my own. The sound effects are under a creative commons licence, not made by myself.

The goal is to collect enough ants to save your ant hill home. Avoid wasps.

* If you have issues running this game in Chrome you may have to try another browser (I haven't been able to get it to load in Chrome successfully)

All art was made in Procreate on iPad.

The music was made on Garageband and a keyboard.

The code was written in C# using Unity.

Sounds Effects:
Bee Buzzing - JonCon_Library
SE2 Ding - pjhedman
Rock destroy - Bertsz
Yay - Higgs01
